actions.Name: Hakaze
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5

actions.Name: Jinpu
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
Combo Action: Gyofu
Combo Potency: 300
Combo Bonus: Grants Fugetsu
Fugetsu Effect: Increases damage dealt by 13%
Duration: 40s
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5

actions.Name: Shifu
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
Combo Action: Gyofu
Combo Potency: 300
Combo Bonus: Grants Fuka
Fuka Effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 13%
Duration: 40s
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5

actions.Name: Yukikaze
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.
Combo Action: Gyofu
Combo Potency: 340
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 15
Combo Bonus: Grants Setsu

actions.Name: Gekko
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.
210 when executed from a target's rear.
Combo Action: Jinpu
Combo Potency: 370
Rear Combo Potency: 420
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Combo Bonus: Grants Getsu

actions.Name: Kasha
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.
210 when executed from a target's flank.
Combo Action: Shifu
Combo Potency: 370
Flank Combo Potency: 420
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Combo Bonus: Grants Ka

actions.Name: Fuga
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5

actions.Name: Mangetsu
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Combo Action: Fuko
Combo Potency: 120
Combo Bonus: Grants Fugetsu
Fugetsu Effect: Increases damage dealt by 13%
Duration: 40s
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Combo Bonus: Grants Getsu

actions.Name: Oka
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Combo Action: Fuko
Combo Potency: 120
Combo Bonus: Grants Fuka
Fuka Effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 13%
Duration: 40s
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Combo Bonus: Grants Ka

actions.Name: Enpi
actions.Description:
Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 100.
Enhanced Enpi Potency: 270
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10

actions.Name: Hissatsu: Shinten
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 250.
Kenki Gauge Cost: 25

actions.Name: Hissatsu: Kyuten
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all nearby enemies.
Kenki Gauge Cost: 25

actions.Name: Hissatsu: Gyoten
actions.Description:
Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Kenki Gauge Cost: 10
Cannot be executed while bound.

actions.Name: Hissatsu: Yaten
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: 10-yalm backstep
Additional Effect: Grants Enhanced Enpi
Duration: 15s
Kenki Gauge Cost: 10
Cannot be executed while bound.

actions.Name: Hagakure
actions.Description: Converts Setsu, Getsu, and Ka into Kenki. Each Sen converted increases your Kenki Gauge by 10. Can only be executed if under the effect of at least one of the three statuses.

actions.Name: Hissatsu: Guren
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 500 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies.
Kenki Gauge Cost: 25
Shares a recast timer with Hissatsu: Senei.

actions.Name: Meditate
actions.Description:
Gradually increases your Kenki Gauge.
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Grants stacks of Meditation when used in combat, up to a maximum of 3
Kenki Gauge not affected when used outside battle.
Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills upon execution. Cannot be executed during the cooldown of weaponskills.

actions.Name: Third Eye
actions.Description:
Reduces the amount of damage taken by the next attack by 10%.
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10 when hit

actions.Name: Meikyo Shisui
actions.Description:
Execute up to 3 weaponskill combos without meeting combo prerequisites. Does not affect Iaijutsu or Ogi Namikiri.
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Successfully landing Gekko grants Fugetsu, and successfully landing Kasha grants Fuka
Additional Effect: Grants Tendo
Duration: 30s
Maximum Charges: 2

actions.Name: Iaijutsu
actions.Description:
Executes a weaponskill depending on current number of Sen stored in Sen Gauge.
1 Sen: Higanbana
2 Sen: Tenka Goken
3 Sen: Midare Setsugekka
While under the effect of Tendo, Tenka Goken changes to Tendo Goken, and Midare Setsugekka changes to Tendo Setsugekka.

actions.Name: Hissatsu: Senei
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 800.
Kenki Gauge Cost: 25
Shares a recast timer with Hissatsu: Guren.

actions.Name: Ikishoten
actions.Description:
Increases Kenki Gauge by 50.
Additional Effect: Grants Ogi Namikiri Ready
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Grants Zanshin Ready
Duration: 30s
Can only be executed while in combat.

actions.Name: Tsubame-gaeshi
actions.Description:
Repeats the previously executed iaijutsu.
Cannot be used to repeat Higanbana.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Tsubame-gaeshi Ready.

actions.Name: Shoha
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 640 for the first enemy, and 65% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed after accumulating three stacks of Meditation by executing Iaijutsu, Meditate, or Ogi Namikiri while in combat.
Consumes all stacks of Meditation upon execution.

actions.Name: Fuko
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10

actions.Name: Ogi Namikiri
actions.Description:
Delivers a critical hit to all enemies in a cone before you with a potency of 900 for the first enemy, and 75% less for all remaining enemies.
Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate.
Grants a stack of Meditation, up to a maximum of 3.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Ogi Namikiri Ready.

actions.Name: Tengentsu
actions.Description:
Reduces the amount of damage taken by the next attack by 10%.
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Tengentsu's Foresight and increases Kenki Gauge by 10 when hit
Tengentsu's Foresight Effect: Gradually restores your HP and reduces damage taken by 10%
Duration: 9s
Cure Potency: 200

actions.Name: Gyofu
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 240.
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5

actions.Name: Zanshin
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack to all enemies in a cone before you with a potency of 900 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Kenki Gauge Cost: 50
Can only be executed while under the effect of Zanshin Ready.

roleActions.Name: Second Wind
roleActions.Description:
Instantly restores own HP.
Cure Potency: 800

roleActions.Name: Bloodbath
roleActions.Description:
Converts a portion of physical damage dealt into HP.
Duration: 20s

roleActions.Name: True North
roleActions.Description:
Nullifies all action direction requirements.
Duration: 10s
Maximum Charges: 2

roleActions.Name: Arm's Length
roleActions.Description:
Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 6s
Additional Effect: When you are struck by a physical attack, the striker will be afflicted with Slow +20%
Duration: 15s

roleActions.Name: Feint
roleActions.Description:
Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 10% and magic damage dealt by 5%.
Duration: 15s

actions.Name: Ogi Namikiri
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Potency is increased to 12,000 when attacking only a single target.
Additional Effect: When attacking two or more targets, creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 8,000 potency
Duration: 10s
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

※Action changes to Kaeshi: Namikiri upon execution.

actions.Name: Hissatsu: Soten
actions.Description:
Swiftly charges forward, dealing damage with a potency of 3,000 to targets in your path.
Additional Effect: Grants Kaiten
Duration: 10s
Maximum Charges: 3
Cannot be executed while bound.

※Yukikaze changes to Hyosetsu while under the effect of Kaiten.
※Gekko changes to Mangetsu while under the effect of Kaiten.
※Kasha changes to Oka while under the effect of Kaiten.

actions.Name: Hissatsu: Chiten
actions.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 25% and delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000 every time you suffer damage.
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Kuzushi
Kuzushi Effect: Increases damage you deal target by 20%
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Zanshin Ready
Duration: 10s

※Action changes to Zanshin upon execution.

actions.Name: Mineuchi
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 2,000.
Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Debana
Debana Effect: Increases damage you deal target by 10%
Duration: 4s
Extends Kuzushi duration by 4s to a maximum of 6s. Effect cannot be stacked with Kuzushi when extending its duration.
Additional Effect: Stun
Duration: 2s

actions.Name: Meikyo Shisui
actions.Description:
Grants Meikyo Shisui.
Meikyo Shisui Effect: Nullifies status afflictions that can be removed by Purify, as well as knockback and draw-in effects
Duration: 3s
Additional Effect: Grants Tendo Setsugekka Ready
Duration: 10s

※Action changes to Tendou Setsugekka upon execution.

actions.Name: Zantetsuken
actions.Description:
Swiftly charges forward, dealing damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 24,000.
If target is afflicted with Kuzushi, deals damage equal to 100% of their maximum HP.
Ignores the effects of Guard when dealing damage.
The additional effect of Kuzushi cannot be applied to players riding machina and non-player combatants.
Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.
Gauge Charge Time: 120s
Cannot be executed while bound.

actions.Name: Yukikaze
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000.

※Action changes to Hyosetsu while under the effect of Kaiten.
※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Gekko
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000.
Combo Action: Yukikaze or Hyosetsu

※Action changes to Mangetsu while under the effect of Kaiten.
※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Kasha
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000.
Combo Action: Gekko or Mangetsu

※Action changes to Oka while under the effect of Kaiten.
※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Hyosetsu
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Bind
Duration: 2s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Kaiten.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Mangetsu
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all nearby enemies.
Combo Action: Yukikaze or Hyosetsu
Can only be executed while under the effect of Kaiten.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Oka
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all nearby enemies.
Combo Action: Gekko or Mangetsu
Can only be executed while under the effect of Kaiten.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Kaeshi: Namikiri
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Potency is increased to 12,000 when attacking only a single target.
Combo Action: Ogi Namikiri
Additional Effect: When attacking two or more targets, creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 8,000 potency
Duration: 10s

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Tendo Setsugekka
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 10,000.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Tendo Setsugekka Ready.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Action changes to Tendo Kaeshi Setsugekka upon execution.

actions.Name: Tendo Kaeshi Setsugekka
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 10,000.
Combo Action: Tendo Setsugekka

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Zanshin
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: Absorbs 100% of damage dealt as HP
Can only be executed while under the effect of Zanshin Ready

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

roleActions.Name: Guard
roleActions.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 90% and grants immunity to Stun, Heavy, Bind, Silence, Half-asleep, Sleep, Deep Freeze, and knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 5s
Movement speed is reduced by 50% for the duration of this effect.
Effect ends upon reuse, using another action, or when the effect duration expires.

roleActions.Name: Standard-issue Elixir
roleActions.Description:
Restores your HP and MP to maximum.
Casting will be interrupted when damage is taken.

roleActions.Name: Purify
roleActions.Description:
Removes Stun, Heavy, Bind, Silence, Deep Freeze, and Miracle of Nature.
Additional Effect: Grants Resilience
Resilience Effect: Nullifies status afflictions that can be removed by Purify, as well as knockback and draw-in effects
Duration: 3s
Can be used even when under the effect of certain status afflictions.

roleActions.Name: Sprint
roleActions.Description:
Increases movement speed by 50%.
Effect ends upon reuse or execution of another action.
